metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5544 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
OpenSLP as used in ESXi and the Horizon DaaS appliances has a heap overwrite issue. VMware has evaluated the severity of this issue to be in the Critical severity range with a maximum CVSSv3 base score of 9.8.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-5544` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libslp1 - 1.2.1-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
slpd - 1.2.1-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
slptool - 1.2.1-11ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> issue is in slpd binary package

criterions.comment: openslp-dfsg package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.1-11ubuntu0.16.04.2').
